description.ko: 복잡한 음파와 음향 주파수의 시각화를 나타내는 첨단 디지털 엔티티로, 빛과 기하학적 형상을 리드미컬한 교향곡으로 결합합니다.
description.en: A high-tech digital entity representing the visualization of complex sound waves and acoustic frequencies, blending light and geometry into a rhythmic symphony.

prompt: Abstract digital visualization of sound waves, ECHO-0 entity manifesting as a core of pulsating light, translucent geometric ribbons of audio frequencies undulating in a dark void, cinematic neon lighting, 8k resolution, synthwave aesthetic, futuristic interface overlays, high contrast, rhythmic energy patterns.
